item.title: Python Speed
item.description: What blocks Ruby, Python to get Javascript V8 speed? What blocks Ruby, Python to get Javascript V8 speed? Are there any Ruby / Python features that are blocking implementation of optimizations (e.g. inline caching) V8 engine has? Python is co-developed by Google guys so it shouldn’t be blocked by software patents. Or this is rather matter of resources put into the V8 project by Google. Nothing. Well, okay: money. (And time, people, resources, but if you have money, you can buy those.
